messages.title: Local leadership
messages.content: Local people say they want Valerie Allen to be the strong local voice that the Sefton Central constituency needs.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Support for Small Businesses and Shops
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Encourages small businesses and shops and encourage them to take on apprentices to give our young people a good job.
Seven-day NHS will be offered to millions.
Focus on growth, through businesses a strong and secure economy, and good schools we want for our families.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Ed Miliband, Nicola Sturgeon, Nick Clegg
mentions.tacticalSituation: SNP Coalition could cost Labour their Sefton Central Constituency.

issues.economy: Focus on growth, through businesses a strong and secure economy, and good schools we want for our families.
issues.health: Seven-day NHS will be offered to millions.
issues.socialWelfare: Benefits cap keeps rising to afford a better future for your family and Britain.

leaflet.personalStatement: As a local businesswoman I will champion small businesses and shops and encourage them to take on apprentices to give our young people a good job.
leaflet.additionalNotes: Remember, if you haven't sent your postal vote back yet, you can take your postal pack to any Polling Station in the constituency before 10pm on 7 May.
